title: Definitive X-Men Cinematic Universe Ranking
description:
1.Logan - https://youtu.be/kw3sKtc1-SM
2.X-Men: Days Of Future Past - https://youtu.be/vgpS-DvaIj4
3.Deadpool 2 - https://youtu.be/6L3eVShOR-c
4.Deadpool - https://youtu.be/5v1WddU5mbA
5.The Wolverine - https://youtu.be/iyoBVRbpbGg
6.X-Men: First Class - https://youtu.be/NUXmr_PFbgc
7.X2: X-Men United - https://youtu.be/sDzI-ldPMtM
8.X-Men: Apocalypse - https://youtu.be/ryexcdWpn6E
9.X-Men: The Last Stand - https://youtu.be/SQ-IJfGrhYw
10.X-Men - https://youtu.be/MxBgjXeqqYQ
11.X-Men Origins: Wolverine - https://youtu.be/ZWP9LgocHps

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
